title: Top Bills Coordinator May Have Lost Job Over Collapse in KC: Insider

title: Bills Rumors: Struggling Specialist Takes Pay Cut, Could be Released

sentence: #GoBills #BillsMafia #Fitzmagic #Bills pic.twitter.com/0ZA7ICyTT8 — Lance Valcour (@Lance_Valcour) March 17, 2022 Ryan Fitzpatrick has to be the Bills backup QB if they want to win the Super Bowl, don’t ask me why, it’s to mathematical for me to explain maybe some fitzmagic next season #BillsMafia https://t.co/Wtu9eNeN4g pic.twitter.com/7EIICD9Se1 — Jenna Cottrell (@JennaCottrell) March 19, 2022 However, with Keenum signing with Buffalo, and Bakley’s contract seemingly just around the corner, it seems Fitzpatrick is officially out of the running.
